trans-unit.source: Contains all the localizable resources in a BAML record.

The dictionary contains a mapping from resource keys (specified as <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResourceKey> objects) to resource values (specified as <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResource> objects).
## XAML Text Usage
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary"></xref> class.
Adds an item with the provided key and value to the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary"></xref>.
A key for the resource.
An object that contains the resource.
key is .
An item with the same key already exists.
Deletes all resources from the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary"></xref> object.
Determines whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary"></xref> object contains a resource with a specified key.
The resource key to find.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary"></xref> object contains a resource with the specified key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
key is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

Copies the contents of a <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary"></xref> object to a one-dimensional array of <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> objects, starting at a specified index.
An array of objects to hold the data.
The starting index value.
arrayIndex is less than zero.
arrayIndex exceeds the destination array length.
-or- Copy cannot fit in the remaining array space between arrayIndex and the destination array length.
Gets the number of localizable resources in the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary"></xref>.
The number of localizable resources.
Returns an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary"></xref>.
A specialized <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionaryEnumerator"></xref> that can iterate the contents of the dictionary.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary"></xref> object has a fixed size.
Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary"></xref> object is read-only.
Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a localizable resource specified by its key.
The key value of the resource.
The value of the resource.
Gets a collection that contains all the keys in the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary"></xref> object.
A collection that contains all the keys in the object.
Removes a specified localizable resource from the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary"></xref>.
The key for the resource to be removed.
key is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets the key of the root element, if it is localizable.
You can set some properties for the entire page by adding or modifying the properties of its root element, due to the effects of property inheritance for dependency properties.
For example, changing the root element's <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A> property sets that property for every element on the page.
The key of the root element, if it is localizable.
Otherwise, the value is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A zero-based <xref:System.Array> that receives the copied items.
The first position in the specified <xref:System.Array> to receive the copied contents.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.Count%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The number of items in the collection.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The key of the element to add.
The object value to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Contains%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The key to locate in the dictionary.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Object> is found in the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
An enumerator object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The key of the item to get or set.
The item with the specified key.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The <xref:System.Object> to remove from the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
Gets a collection that contains all the values in the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizationDictionary"></xref>.
A collection that contains all the values in the object.
